gameDetails.name: Pax Hispanica: Promo 2 â€“ Captains
gameDetails.description:
This Promo Pack of 14 Haven Cards, featuring infamous pirate captains from the Golden Age of Piracy, post-1701-15 Spanish Succession.

These new cards introduce legendary figures, many of whom were part of the notorious "flying gang" of outlaws.

Designed to replace the original 14 Haven Cards in your game, these cards follow the same core rules with a few additional twists, adding more strategy and adventure to your gameplay.

—description from the publisher
